about.description:
NASA's [Satellite Situation Center](https://sscweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/)
(SSC) is a system to cast geocentric spacecraft location information
into a framework of (empirical) geophysical regions and mappings of
spacecraft locations along lines of the Earth's magnetic field.
This library implements the client side of the
[SSC RESTful web services](https://berniegsfc.github.io/sscws/REST/).  See
[sscws package API reference](https://berniegsfc.github.io/sscws/REST/py/sscws/index.html)
for additional details.
about.summary: NASA's Satellite Situation Center Web Service Client Library

about.description:
NASA's [Satellite Situation Center](https://sscweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/)
(SSC) is a system to cast geocentric spacecraft location information
into a framework of (empirical) geophysical regions and mappings of
spacecraft locations along lines of the Earth's magnetic field.
This library implements the client side of the
[SSC RESTful web services](https://berniegsfc.github.io/sscws/REST/).  See
[sscws package API reference](https://berniegsfc.github.io/sscws/REST/py/sscws/index.html)
for additional details.
about.summary: NASA's Satellite Situation Center Web Service Client Library

name: sscws
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set python_min = python_min|default("3.6") %}
{% set name = "sscws" %}
{% set version = "2.4.5" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/sscws-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 78dc510d3ed46005d6d5af3f5c63ead00ea0bad6b804cc9ae726d57154620dbd

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python >={{ python_min }}.*
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}.*
    - python-dateutil >=2.8.0
    - requests >=2.20
    - numpy >=1.19.4
    - urllib3 >=1.26.16

test:
  imports:
    - sscws
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - pip

about:
  home: https://sscweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/WebServices/REST
  summary: NASA's Satellite Situation Center Web Service Client Library
  license: NOSL
  license_file: NASA_Open_Source_Agreement_1.3.txt
  description: |
    NASA's [Satellite Situation Center](https://sscweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/)
    (SSC) is a system to cast geocentric spacecraft location information
    into a framework of (empirical) geophysical regions and mappings of
    spacecraft locations along lines of the Earth's magnetic field.
    This library implements the client side of the
    [SSC RESTful web services](https://berniegsfc.github.io/sscws/REST/).  See
    [sscws package API reference](https://berniegsfc.github.io/sscws/REST/py/sscws/index.html)
    for additional details.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - candeynasa
    - ericthewizard
    - berniegsfc
